abilities.name: Toxic Gas
abilities.effect: As long as Muk ex is your Active Pokémon, ignore all Poké-Powers and Poké-Bodies other than Toxic Gas.

attacks.name: Poison Breath
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Slimy Water
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Colorless Energy in the Defending Pokémon's Retreat Cost (after applying effects to the Retreat Cost).
